page_content: The page discusses quality assurance for communal and cantonal resident and object registers, including software updates.
The page discusses fraudulent calls related to Covid-19 vaccinations and data security measures.
The page provides information on the "ePlanung Portal," a software for electronic planning, and mentions the availability of instructional videos.
The page provides forms and information related to the registration and modification of partnerships in the trade register.
The page discusses the roles and responsibilities of municipalities in child and adult protective measures.
